name: 9th Dawn
blurb: 9th Dawn is a classic RPG game with modern elements developed for Android & iOS smartphones/tablets

rewards.reward: Green Slime - A sincere thank-you for supporting our project! Everyone will get an email when the game is to be released

Young Grey Wolf - Consider this pledge your official Android pre-order! As a token of our thanks for supporting our project, we will send you a unique Kickstarter version of the game in .apk format via e-mail. You will also receive a key in the same e-mail which will allow you to activate your copy. 

Note 1: iOS users see the next tier!
Note 2: All subsequent tiers include the Android (and unfortunately not the iOS version) pre-order as a reward. We are looking to remedy this and will honour any iOS users with the pre-order if this change is possible in the future!

Young Brown Wolf - Select this reward tier for an iOS pre-order of the game! For now, we are limiting this to 50, due to some restrictions on developer app gifting put in place by Apple. However, keep an eye out for updates because we are going to contact them about increasing that number. Keep in mind, the iOS release will be somewhat delayed compared to the Android release, due to Apple's review process.
Goblin Scout - Not only do we extend our thanks to you, but you will also receive an honorable mention in our credits, along with your pre-order!

Brown Tarachnid - You'll receive a digital copy of the world map emailed to you along with an information sheet of 10 of our monsters to help get you started, as well as a place in our credits. \r\n\r\nIn addition to this, you will also receive a free copy of the game when it is released for the PC, estimated Q1 2013.
Grey Wolf - In addition to the previous rewards, you'll also receive a digital download of the full soundtrack for the game (it's awesome!)
Kobold Skirmisher - In addition to previous rewards, you'll be able to have a combat item named after you (eg, Ruki's Longsword). Limited supply!

Kobold Captain - In addition to previous rewards (excluding the custom item), you will receive a large physical print of the world map including place names. Estimated size is 18"x12". Please note we can only distribute to UK/Europe/Australia/USA!
Felworm - In addition to previous rewards, (excluding the custom item), you will receive a T-shirt featuring a monster from the game.

Valcrist - Merchandise pack! In addition to the previous rewards (including the custom item), you will an additional t-shirt as well as a quality printed CD soundtrack with an artistic case.\r\n\r\nThere will also be an in-game plaque with your custom image on it, in an ancient dungeon. If the player looks at it, a small paragraph of your 'story' can be displayed (no adverts)

Official Welk Squad Member - In addition to the Valcrist level reward, you will also gain access to any future alpha/beta testing for Valorware games, including direct contact information for Valorware developers. We will also provide you with prompt technical assistance or customer service regarding any of our products. You will also get an NPC named after you, with a short dialogue based on whatever you want (no adverts)

Welk Squad Captain - All of the above, plus you get to work with us over the internet to create your own quest for the game. You can involve up to 3 new&unique items, 3 other NPC's and we'd be pretty flexible on some other things, it'd be interesting to hear your idea!

Welk Squad Captain - All lesser pledges, plus you can create your own dungeon. Draw this in a graphics program, and we will import it into the game with our image importer. We will decorate the map and include the (existing)monsters you want in there.
